attributes.review: this app is literally useless and it lags a lot. All I wanted to see was what our racist, homophobic, rapist president was planning and it didn’t even let me do that.
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: I honestly can’t believe Apple would even allow such an application to exist on their App Store.

attributes.review: He is exactly what this country does NOT need in order to progress. He is clearly not open minded, and we need a president that is.

attributes.review: Slow and hard to understand. It froze multiple times and exiting and entering the app did not help

attributes.review: SO DISAPPOINTED!!!!! I got this app to obviously keep tabs on the “beloved”🍊 in office.. and then my phone crashed!!! In other words this app (and the 🍊) are very ugly no kiss for them 😌🤚

attributes.review: I heard that this app stalks you and my phone has been glitchy ever sense I got it. All I have to say. Don’t recommend this app for sure.
attributes.title: I hate this app.

attributes.review: This app crashed very easily, as it showed an orange man every single time o opened the app.  I honestly wouldn’t mind it if the orange glitch jumped off a bridge and reincarnated into a chicken so we could roast it 😺
attributes.title: Fugly Rats

attributes.review: Took days to download then when I went into it it wiped all my data from my phone
